alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 27 at 9:10AM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting George, Greene and Jackson Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. At 23.5 feet, Water is under homes in Plum Bluff Estates. Streets of Merrill flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 22.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise, cresting at a stage of 23.5 feet Monday afternoon. The river will then begin to gradually fall, falling to a stage of 22.8 feet by Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
